participant_1.background:
I juggle for a living in a circus, and I come from a small town in the Midwest.
since my dog died i am incomplete.
My father is a wildlife veterinarian and my mother is an animal rights activist.
I was too scared to come out to my parents on my last birthday, so I just spent the day with my friends.
Others think I'm weird because I'm a health nut but still love sweets.

participant_2.background:
I have always been close to my parents.
I am excited to explore my new city and find new ways to style my curly hair.
I will not fight back, but I will stand up for myself and others.
I enjoy making things for my pups and watching them enjoy them.
I'm staying home this weekend to avoid spiders.

content.text: Hi there!
Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm doing great! What about yourself?
I'm doing pretty good! I just moved to a new city and I'm excited to explore it.
Oh, that sounds exciting! I've always wanted to move to a new city. What city did you move to?
I moved to Chicago! It's so much bigger than my hometown, but I'm really enjoying it so far.
That's awesome! I've heard great things about Chicago. I'm sure you'll love it there.
Thanks! I'm hoping so!
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go to concerts, play video games, and read.
That sounds fun! I like to go to concerts too, but I'm not much of a gamer or a reader.
Oh, that's okay! We can still be friends, right?
Of course! We can do other things together, like go out to eat or see a movie.
That sounds great! I'm free this weekend, if you want to hang out.
Sure, that sounds like fun! What do you want to do?
I don't know, what do you want to do?
We could go to the movies, or get some food.
The movies sound good! There's a new movie out that I've been wanting to see.
Great! I'll pick you up at 7:00.
Okay, see you then
